title: Medkit
description: Medkits are a craftable utility in Dying Light that restore health points. They can be found in certain areas such as in the back of ambulances, certain checkpoints, and in Quartermaster inventories. They can also rarely be found inside cars. Medkits will heal the player, restoring 100 HP. Later on in the game when you acquire Sturdiness, Sturdiness II, and Ultimate Survivor, it will often take 2 medkits to fully recover your health due to the increased maximum health. They can also rarely be found inside cars. Uses[ ] Medkits will heal the player, restoring 100 HP. Later on in the game when you acquire [Sturdiness](/wiki/Sturdiness), [Sturdiness II](/wiki/Sturdiness_II), and [Ultimate Survivor](/wiki/Ultimate_Survivor), it will often take 2 medkits to fully recover your health due to the increased maximum health. Military Medkits are stronger, more effective medkits which cannot be crafted and can only be found in the [Dying Light: The Following](/wiki/Dying_Light:_The_Following) DLC. They can be found in water towers, radio towers, or in police vans/cars and heal up to 200 health.
